topics.body:
Is it just me or does Hunter X Hunter have too much pointless deaths?
I mean, people are dying like flies in this show I can barely give a shit about it because I just don't care about them.
If you want to make the story better, at least give them a chance before killing them. Then, readers might actually enjoy it more.
